patterns: my child does not speak english
we do not speak english well
responses: Parents should call their school to request a translator for school conferences or when they have general questions about the District.
The current superintendent is Ivan Duran, to learn more visit this link https://bsd405.org/about/superintendent/

patterns: How do I contact the administrative and support offices?
responses: In order to find staff email please go to this link https://bsd405.org/help/staff/ and search their name

patterns: when is the next school board meeting?
responses: Regular meetings are held on the first and third Tuesday of each month, beginning at 4:30 pm. To get more detailed information visit this site https://go.boarddocs.com/wa/bsd405/Board.nsf/Public

patterns: who are the school board members and how can I contact them?
contact info for school board members
responses: You can find the school board members and find their contact info at this page https://bsd405.org/about/school-board/
